description:
The new leader of God`s Army takes the people of the town hostage to lure Kenshiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Shi e no Byouyomi Yatte Mirukai
Schurken! Machen wir einen Countdown bis zu eurem Tod?
Villains! How About Counting Down to Your Own Death?!
悪党ども! 死への秒よみやってみるかい
